amendment.description: Amendment prohibits funds in the bill from being used to enforce the judgement of the U.S. District Court for the Western District of Texas in the case of United States v. Ignacio Ramos, Et Al. decided March 8, 2006, or the sentences imposed.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to enforce the judgement of the U.S. District Court for the Western District of Texas in the case of United States v. Ignacio Ramos, Et Al. decided March 8, 2006; or the sentences imposed.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Poe amendment (A033) Agreed to by voice vote.
